desc-about-me: Hello, I am Martina and I love to create unique and beautiful wooden objects. I like to value the beauty of wood, beauty captured in its natural texture, in shapes, colours, ideas. Matitta Kayu was born out of a desire to play with wood, to have a hobby, to find happiness after a day of work. It is a wonderful feeling that we all will be happy to discover.

shipping-info: Shipping method: courier. The shipping in Romania is 20 lei, in any city within the coverage area of courier companies. Exception city Cluj-Napoca where the shipping is free.
